name: Step2 Rain Showers Splash Pond Water Table, Kids Water and Sand Activity Sensory Playset, Summer Outdoor Toys, 13 Piece Water Toy Accessories, For Toddlers 1.5+ Years Old, Blue & Green
short_description: This kids’ water table will create a mini water park right in your backyard! Use the large bucket to scoop up water from the pond and pour into the top waterfall tray. Watch as the rainfall effect is activated as the water splashes into the pond!

As the waterfall drains back into the water table pond, maze-like spinners, ramps and buckets are activated! Rearrange the put-and-place maze pieces to create new waterfalls for fun cause and effect STEM play
Kids can make a spinning splash in the “rain” with the hand-held spinning wheel and use the side flipper to flip figures back into the pond!
Easy to clean! Use disinfectant wipes or household cleaners whenever you want!

From The Side Flipper To The Put-And-Place Maze Pieces, Kids Will Have Lots Of Splish-Splash Fun With The Included Water Table Accessories!
